entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023
